remarks: Weak deduction theorem eliminating three hypotheses.  See comments in ~ dedth2h .  (Contributed by NM, 15-May-1999.)
statement:
dedth3h.1 $e |- ( A = if ( ph , A , D ) -> ( th <-> ta ) ) $.
dedth3h.2 $e |- ( B = if ( ps , B , R ) -> ( ta <-> et ) ) $.
dedth3h.3 $e |- ( C = if ( ch , C , S ) -> ( et <-> ze ) ) $.
dedth3h.4 $e |- ze $.
dedth3h $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps /\ ch ) -> th ) $.
